Fire Shield

area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster

fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 20-
Bless/Buff: Fire Shield
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield])
A wall of fire surrounds the mage. Anyone trying to strike the mage in melee combat will be burned by the Fire Shield first. Attackers with long weapons such as spears and pikes will not suffer as severe burns as an attacker with a dagger or fist.
Fire dmg: 9 AP fire dmg (increased by +1 per extra mage level, reduced by weapon length)
